lead_paragraph: The six-time W.N.B.A. All-Star Tina Thompson told a television station that she was seriously considering leaving the Comets, but then said that she was not close to making a decision.
snippet: The six-time W.N.B.A. All-Star Tina Thompson told a television station that she was seriously considering leaving the Comets, but then said that she was not close to making a decision.
